DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indictor to specify if the treatment that uses substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body, has been administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the administration of systemic therapy to an individual.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (sis-TEM-ik THER-a-pee) Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.

Concepts.definition: Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG Mapping Path for 62744
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedProcedure[1] AND DefinedProcedure[2] > PerformedProcedure[2] AND DefinedProcedure[3] > PerformedProcedure[3] AND PerformedProcedure[1].negationIndicator WHERE DefinedProcedure[1].nameCode = 'Perform Cellular Therapy Protocol' AND  DefinedProcedure[2].nameCode = 'Perform Systemic Therapy' AND  DefinedProcedure[3].nameCode = 'Perform Cellular Therapy' AND  DefinedCompositionRelationship[1a].joinCode = 'Master Protocol' AND  DefinedCompositionRelationship[1a].sequence = 1 AND  DefinedCompositionRelationship[2a].joinCode = 'immediately prior' AND  DefinedCompositionRelationship[1a].sequence = 2 AND  PerformedProcedure[1].negationIndicator = 'false'  AND  PerformedProcedure[3].negationIndicator = 'false'

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient initiated oral or IV cancer systemic therapy or has patient received a prescription order with stated intent to initiate within 30 days following step 0 registration date?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient initiated their cancer treatment (i.e IV or Oral systemic) within 30 days of step 0 registration date?
